effects.message: With a big swoooosh, and roll and tuck you manage to slay the dragon. Congratulations, you've just won the game!

fish.name: Fish
fish.description: A strange key shaped fish, Mmm now you don't smell good..

effects.message: You try to spank the dragon with the Wooden Sword and the dragon just seems to enjoy it and with a sneeze his fire consumes you. You are dead.
For some reason a fish appeared in your inventory

dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.description: A mighty Dragon with a breath of wildfire

dragon.name: Lying dead man
dragon.description: A dead man while you observing it you can see a glimmering light

search.message: You search the dead man and see a glimmering light, looks like a key. You take the key

take.message: You cannot take the dead man, also don't be weird.

chest.name: Chest
chest.description: A wooden old chest with a crack in it.

open.message: You open the chest and inside you see something brown it looks like a piece of wood. With further examination you see that it's a Wooden Sword. You take the Sword...

attack.message: You attack the chest, chest is still locked.

room1.name: Room 1
room1.description: You found yourself in a dank cellar with a chilly breeze...

actions.TODO: hitta på hur actionsobjektet ska se ut

exits.name: Wooden door
exits.description: You look around and see a wooden old door.
exits.locked_description: You try to open it but to no avail, the door is locked but you see a rusty keyhole. Maybe there is something you can fit in it.

key.open_description: You put in the key and it fits perfectly, you turn it around and slowly open the wooden door. It creaks worse than your hungry stomach.

exits.name: A dark hole
exits.description: A hole in the wall i think I can squeeze through it.

exits.name: A metal door
exits.description: A sturdy metal door, I might be able to budge it with a bit of force.

room4.name: A cozy room
room4.description: You found yourself in a room covered with hello kitty pink pillows, it looks very cozy.
